title: Non Lynda New Masters Academy - Intro to the Laws of Light
description:
Non Lynda New Masters Academy - Intro to the Laws of Light by Steve Huston

Audio: aac 44100 Hz stereo | Video: mpeg4 yuv420p 796x448 29.97 fps | 57mins18secs | Beginner-Intermediate | 337MB
Genre: E-learning | Painting |  Uploaded in Feb 12, 2015 by 2boweb



In this video lesson world-renowned painter Steve Huston will walk you through the essential laws of light for artists. Steve will teach you how to use direct as well as indirect light to model your forms and create the sense of a light source. You will also learn how to use shadows and reflected light to create a sense of realism and luminosity
